personalInfo.name: Mart Traagel
personalInfo.title: Data Engineer at Foxway | Lecturer at TalTech
intro: I'm Mart, a data enthusiast with a knack for turning complex problems into elegant solutions. I'm a Data Engineer at Foxway, crafting efficient data pipelines and optimizing processes. Once or twice a week I'm sharing my passion for tech as a Lecturer at TalTech.

When I'm not knee-deep in code or explaining algorithms, you might find me tinkering with my latest startup idea or dreaming up sustainable tech solutions. I've got a soft spot for DevOps, and I get a kick out of making systems run smoother and faster.
Got a cool project idea or just want to geek out about data? Hit me up.

experience.title: Data Engineer
experience.description: Spearheading CI/CD pipeline development for IaC and data transformation. Optimizing ETL processes and implementing best practices for infrastructure frameworks.

experience.title: Lecturer
experience.description: Teaching Programming, Algorithms & Data Structures, and Digital Logic. Inspiring the next generation of tech innovators with hands-on learning experiences.

experience.title: Junior Data Engineer
experience.description: Improved ETL stability, automated reporting, and developed a real-time reporting web application. Optimized Airflow configurations and enhanced data migration pipelines.

education.degree: Master of Science in Engineering, Data Science
